mapper.select: SELECT gcbh AS projNo,'合同价格' as type,xsjg as amount,xsjg as estimate FROM [192.168.0.99\cb].[cbxt].[dbo].[Uv_OuterCode_CPDM] WHERE cpbh = #{projNo} UNION ALL SELECT b3.cpbh AS projNo,'报价成本' AS type,sum(b3.jezj) AS amount,b4.xsjg AS estimate FROM (SELECT b1.cpbh,b1.mbcbbh,b1.jezj,b2.mjbz FROM [192.168.0.99\cb].[cbxt].[dbo].[bjcb] b1 LEFT JOIN [192.168.0.99\cb].[cbxt].[dbo].[mbcbdm] b2 ON b1.mbcbbh=b2.mbcbbh WHERE cpbh = #{projNo} AND isnull(mjbz,'0') = '1') b3 CROSS JOIN (SELECT top 1 xsjg FROM [192.168.0.99\cb].[cbxt].[dbo].[Uv_OuterCode_CPDM] WHERE cpbh = #{projNo}) b4 GROUP BY b3.cpbh,b4.xsjg UNION ALL SELECT c3.cpbh AS projNo,'目标成本' AS type,sum(c3.je) AS amount,c4.xsjg AS estimate FROM (SELECT c1.cpbh,c1.mbcbbh,c1.je,c2.mjbz FROM [192.168.0.99\cb].[cbxt].[dbo].[mbcb] c1 LEFT JOIN [192.168.0.99\cb].[cbxt].[dbo].[mbcbdm] c2 ON c1.mbcbbh = c2.mbcbbh WHERE c1.cpbh = #{projNo} AND isnull(c2.mjbz,'0') = '1') c3 CROSS JOIN (SELECT top 1 xsjg FROM [192.168.0.99\cb].[cbxt].[dbo].[Uv_OuterCode_CPDM] WHERE cpbh = #{projNo}) c4 GROUP BY c3.cpbh,c4.xsjg UNION ALL SELECT d3.gcbh AS projNo,'实际成本' AS type,sum(d3.je) AS amount, d4.xsjg AS estimate FROM [192.168.0.99\cb].[cbxt].[dbo].[uv_getcb_ini] d3 CROSS JOIN (SELECT top 1 xsjg FROM [192.168.0.99\cb].[cbxt].[dbo].[Uv_OuterCode_CPDM] WHERE cpbh = #{projNo}) d4 WHERE gcbh IN (SELECT gcbh FROM [192.168.0.99\cb].[cbxt].[dbo].[uv_outercode_gcdm] WHERE cpbh = #{projNo}) GROUP BY d3.gcbh,d4.xsjg
